msg: MAHOUT-1272 Parallel SGD matrix factorizer for SVDrecommender

author: nickwilliams
msg: [LOG4J2-270] Comments are allowed in service provider-configuration files. However, Tomcat 7 < 7.0.43 barfs when it encounters these comments. It's not reasonable to ask all Tomcat 7 users to upgrade to 7.0.43 (and 7.0.43 won't be out until August), so removing the copyright.
